website_summaries.verdict: A versatile choice with great sound.
pros: High-definition sound comes through clear and balanced
Noise suppression technology makes these work for noise cancellation too
Wireless range of 30 feet with up to eight hours of active time
cons: Some users find the ear hooks uncomfortable for their ear shapes

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Senso earbuds are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth earbuds are awesome! I use them with Apple Nano IPod. I am able to adjust volume, skip songs and they don’t fall out of my ears when walking...I’m trying to live a healthy lifestyle and these are going to help my walks be more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hubble

customer_reviews.title: they sound fine.
customer_reviews.text: These have a slightly different angle entering the ear canal than the S 250 model. These hurt my ears after wearing them for only a short period. My Powerbeats 2 and my Senso S250 do not hurt my ears at all, even after wearing them for 12 or more hours. I only use them to listen to audiobooks, so I can't say how they perform for music. For my audiobooks, they sound fine.
customer_reviews.author: Major Combs

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Senso headphones. I bought a slightly more expensive set but don't hear any difference. The base does not seem to be a prevalent as my first pair. These are good quality headphones for the price. I use them a the gym, mainly for listening to podcasts. They have plenty of volume, wide dymaic range with decent battery life. I usually get 6-7 hours of "on" time with each charge. They do charge quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Whittenberg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself. My kids asked if they could listen to the sound quality and asked if I could order a pair for each of them. They love them as well. We've all had a pair of the Beats ear buds and had issues with them. We've had an issue or two with these as wel. Customer service with this company is excellent. I do suggest purchasing the extra warranty. Covered for the first year by the manufacturer warranty plus the extra warranty, you can't loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Not an audiophile but they work for me. I use at the gym and get more than a weeks usage before having to recharge them. Wish the ear hoop was a bit more stiff and moldable to grip the back of the ear but that is probably a more personal thing. They do stay in the ear when jogging, etc but just wish I could make them a bit snugger.
customer_reviews.author: Shops2little

customer_reviews.title: Not one to do reviews but these things are pretty awesome. They aren’t too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Not one to do reviews but these things are pretty awesome. They aren’t too heavy, they don’t stick out of your ears too far and they don’t move around in your ears no matter what activity you’re doing. Mowing, running, digging holes, I’ve done it all and they stay in place. They do have quite a lot of bass so it might take a little getting used to but the overall sound is great and I’m very happy. I’ve tried other wireless earbuds, corded buds of all kind and these are by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphones, the sound quality is super clear, I bought them because I wanted to have my hands free when exercising and I didn't want to disturb other people with I was listening, I also use it when I am driving, the best part is that it has a dual port car charger, I like the other accessories too like; 3 extra pairs of eartips, a compact carrying case, the dual port charger for Apple and USB and a regular charging cable. I like that the this headphones stay in when I using them, overall is a good quality headphones and the sound super clear. I wish the range was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Deal finder

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge any more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones a little over two months ago. First and foremost the battery life is three hours at best. The sound volume would not go loud enough for my taste, but I guess they don't want you listening too high. Can't argue with that. But now the head phones will not hold a charge. I have tried three different chargers to include the one it came with. So now they are useless and not money well spent. I went to get some help and of course the support help ended on Sept 10th for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been really pleased with these headphones. They have easily connected to all my devices. The battery life has proved to be decent (I use "decent" because I have never actually timed the life of a charge). Ear buds sit comfortably in my ears and provide superior sound.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Better sound and battery for a little more money
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the 25 dollar pair that are more popular. Longer battery life and better sound. I got a pair for me and my son. These will tell you how much batter chagrge it has when it connects on screen for a few seconds which is an cool feature the other doesn't have. If worried about sweat while running go with the other 25 dollar model. It can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: UncleBigTummy

customer_reviews.title: horrible lies
customer_reviews.text: Bass too overpowering, Minimal treble response, not noise cancelling or even noise isolating, poor construction, poor voice confirmations, ear cuffs don't hold ear tips in place in a "secure" way. This product is a complete lie and hurts my ears after 20 minutes. I expected something basic but this is horrible. Even with EQ modification, this is a horrible earphone.
customer_reviews.author: Evvan R.

customer_reviews.title: ... ActivBuds S-250 in addition to these and both are fantastic. The S-270's have a more rounded sound and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of the Senso ActivBuds S-250 in addition to these and both are fantastic. The S-270's have a more rounded sound and better bass than the S-250's. I've also had a pair of Bose Soundsport and prefer these. The fit is nicer, the sound is comperable and the bluetooth connection is the same. For the price, if you like the over-ear type of earbuds, I'm a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: it's have a lot noise sound like small knocking
customer_reviews.text: it's have a lot noise sound like small knocking.. call customer support they try assitt me reset calibration & problem still the same.. noise.NO i do recommend it.......waste my time and money's to buy this..i had another pair costco bluetooth work perfect no problem.. only is short life better not compare this Senso but quality and sound base ten times better then this unit Senso ...
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Tan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Reducing to one star
customer_reviews.text: Died after 6 weeks of use. The small flap that covers the USB port broke off. It never held a charge for longer than 4 hours of use. My Ipod would say it had 70% left and it would die after one hour of use - so that was a problem. Now, it won't charge at all. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Survived my washing machine, v impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically review Amazon products unless they're really disappointing or really impressive. These bluetooth headphones are very impressive. The price point is great, the battery life is very good, the sound quality is on par, and the durability is amazing. These things still work after I mistakenly put them in the washing machine after leaving them in the rear pouch of my running shorts. After a charge and some time to dry, they came right back on, same as before. Best $35 I've spent on headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Better than the newer model
customer_reviews.text: The earhooks on the older model are better than the ones on the newer model. Those bend too much and always have to be adjusted, these are more fixed in a permanent position. Sounds great. You get a car charger with everytime you buy one. I wish they didn't include those. It probably drives the price up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan_1999

customer_reviews.title: More sweat resistant than more expensive wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I purchased a $100 pair of wireless headphones that gave me lots of problems, likely due to the fact that I sweat profusely during exercise. I read the reviews carefully when buying a new pair. Although the reviews were good for the Senso ones, I still was hesitant to buy them since they were so much cheaper than the other brands. I have had no problems with them and have been using them almost daily while running this summer. I'm training for a marathon and the battery is still fine after several hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cannot hold charges anymore after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: it was great initially but lately it won't hold charges. if i charge it full, the next day the battery is dead, even without any usage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Qi Li

customer_reviews.title: They are NOT Beats but you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. I lost the first set so I bought 2 more but found the set I lost. I have 2 on reserve now. The sound great. The ear puffs get firm if you sweat in them, has a great Bluetooth distance, the ear support is a little flimsy on my little ears but they stay in place. The only thing I don’t like is the cord that connects them grips your neck when you sweat and will pull them out of you ear if you turn your head.
customer_reviews.author: LiteningKid

customer_reviews.title: For the price they are fantastic! I hate the ear loop because after a ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are fantastic! I hate the ear loop because after a while it irritates the back of the ear when you wear glasses and the power/pause button is located in vicinity to where you would push the earphone part that goes into the ear so you end up turning off your music if you press precisely in that area. The sound is great, clear and I do get 2 full hours of charge without interruption.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These buds are about the most comfortable ones I've ever owned. I love the over the ear bit for added security. I've used them while outside on my mower and I was able to hear my tunes just fine. The clarity of sound is amazing! The added bonus of a car charger and dual use charger cord put this purchase over the top! Recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sayne

customer_reviews.title: Battery failure - Did not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: The headsets were of great quality and the sound quality was great. I followed all the charging instructions and my first usage was great. However, after that first time the buds went crazy. They would charge then refuse to turn on. I reset to factory settings multiple times, then tried on four different chargers. They would change to charged light but not come on. Then they started turning themselves on and off throughout the evening until they ran out of battery. I returned them and will try another company.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is flatter than Paris Hilton
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is the only positive thing about these headphones. Other than that, the power button is at an odd place that makes me accidentally pause my music repeatedly, and the sound quality is terrible, all the music sounds flat.
customer_reviews.author: El Mastodon

customer_reviews.title: Cord comfort and charge port cover malfunction are top issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Battery life is good. Sound quality reasonable. Accessories great. Cons: The charge port cover does not close after 1 week of use. Also, cord material makes it very uncomfortable if you are wearing a dress shirt. The cord grip falls easily. The best design and cord material can be seen in plantronics backbeat fit 2100. Ideally, the cord should be routed from the back of the ear, not front.
customer_reviews.author: Homayoon Shahinfar

customer_reviews.title: Love these wireless headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The Senso ActivBuds were easy to Bluetooth setup with my phone. The earphones fit comfortably, produce quality sound with music, cellphone calls, etc. They stay secure in my ear while I work out (strength training and jogging). I recommend this product to anyone looking for wireless headphones that are a great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Buy theses for a good listen
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. First ones eat by a puppy Second stolen third still happy with. Now we are talking the first pair i paid 130.00 for the second 50.00 these 35 or so and i must add they have evolved really nicely. Use them all day at work thank you so much. thirty feet of range not like so many others I have bought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do not work1
customer_reviews.text: everything about these headphones is crap - I took a shower to test the waterproof feature and halfway through, they failed. absolute crap
customer_reviews.author: David Chagoya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones and great service
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Senso wireless headphones, the first set is still working, but I was looking for an upgrade, and this is it. I also own a Senso bluetooth speaker that I bought on an Amazon flash sale, and it also works great. I had a question on my first headphone, sent an email to Senso, they responded quickly with an excellent, helpful answer. I am very happy with this and my other Senso products.
customer_reviews.author: MartyP-75

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: sound is excellent. Battery life is good. They fit in my ears nicely. My only complaint, not great range. I'd say about 20 feet maybe lightly more but not much.
customer_reviews.author: norwich34

customer_reviews.title: Quit working .... can't charge anymore.... less than 7 months of ownership
customer_reviews.text: Update: Senso’s customer service was EXCELLENT!!! They have sent me a new pair without any problems....a relief that a company actually stands behind their 1 year warranty without needless games....will be buying again from Senso in the near future!!! This was a great product until it stopped working. Stopped taking a charge all of a sudden. Owned less than 7 months and does not work anymore. Maybe I can get a free replacement pair......
customer_reviews.author: Marty Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and durability. The battery lasts for a day (~18 hrs) before requiring charging. I gave the battery a 4 start rating because there is no way to check the power level. There is an audible message when the battery is getting low, and then it will turn off in just a few minutes. I had a problem where the microphone stopped working. Customer support was absolutely fantastic. When a headset reboot did not correct the problem, the bad set was replaced immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN BRUCE SHERRILL

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting or Noise Canceling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased headphones on 1/10/2018. Here it is January 2019 and they completely shut off, without warning. I've kept the product charged, dry and have never run them over. Also, they are not noise canceling. they hear EVERYTHING in the background, and the person you're speaking to can here EVERYTHING. Not terribly expensive, but you'd hope the product could last at least 2 years. When they did work, the battery life was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Camille P.

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, loud enough even without the volume at full but not distorted. In fact if I'd had had it on full I'd have gone deaf! Easy to pair, easy to use and they stay in. No more or less comfortable than corded earplugs but that's just the nature of the beast. Also, not relevant to the item but 4 days to New Zealand from the U.S? That's lightning fast and faster than some of my local deliveries! An all round terrific deal.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The quality was fairly decent (with the mic being the ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality was fairly decent (with the mic being the only exception) but unfortunately they died after about two months of use. Steer clear and get something else if you don't want to risk ending up with very short-lived headphones. Update: I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement pair for the original defective headphones. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Felipe Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Bluetooth wireless headphones! They are a great product at an amazing price! I would buy over and over! My favorite headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones. Unfortunately, after a few months they died. However, my call to the service center was the best customer service experience I've ever had: friendly interaction on the phone, helpful in trying to first solve the issue, and then an immediate replacement shipped out with numerous apologies from the company. Very pleased with the overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hattingh

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound from headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from headphones, have to play around a bit with the earbud sizes. Angle of the ear orifice may not align up perfectly to your ear canal, more trying the ear bud sizes. The sound quality is great, I only have it up to three on volume an it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rico 2 sauve

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphones totally died after two months of use. They will not recharge at all. Holding down the multi-function key does nothing. Leaving them plugged in for an extended period of time does nothing. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, but left ear out after about 6 most. Can't find any way to contact seller. Won't be doing this again
customer_reviews.author: bjkirschn

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! Long range
customer_reviews.text: Buy these. They are awesome! Long range, super long battery life, and fits well in my ears. Only down side is that it’s hard to switch between tracks.
customer_reviews.author: A&A

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic headphones. Noise canceling feature works great, the sound quality is awesome, they don't slip out of my ears, and the battery lasts quite a while. Both of my parents and a friend have them as well and love them. The only thing that would make them better is if they came with a piece to make the cord adjustable or tie it back. It's quite long and sometimes sticks to my neck while working out and sweating. A small black rubber band will do the trick honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Real good
customer_reviews.text: Real good sound has more clear voice than previous version 250. But slightly less bass. Really light and sleek worth every dollar plus i got next day shipping even though it was supposed to get here within a week 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jes2lift

customer_reviews.title: a fair bit more comfortable than the 250's i had perviously
customer_reviews.text: I dig these! a fair bit more comfortable than the 250's i had perviously. solid sound and a nice bit of battery life too. as someone who listens to music almost all day these are pretty good for the price. If I had one complaint its that they are a bit bass heavy in terms of the general sound quality but that's nothing a little tweaking of an EQ wont fix!
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ears
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product however I had a couple of issues that caused me to return them. The ear hooks are very ridged and not adjustable. I have small ears so the distance from the ear hook and the ear pad (for sound) is long & the headphones wouldn't sit in my ear properly affecting sound quality and its ability to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMom73

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The fact that these are just as good as my powerbeats 3’s is amazing to to me.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds for running long distances or relaxing on long flights.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and did not need to be adjusted while I was running which was a concern. Paired with my fitbit Iconic without a problem at all. These headphones will hold a charge as the pamphlet states. I used them on a 7 hour flight and still had plenty of battery life. I highly recommend them."
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Just above average.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting these to be better then they are. With all the good reviews and even talking to other people that have or do own them i thought they were going to be great. They are better then average and that is about it. They do seem to be built well but i have only used them for a little over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: I love headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift from my sister about a year ago. That being said the sound quality is amazing it’s super noise cancelling. And it lasts me all day. I love these anyone looking for Wireless Headphones look no more these are the best you will find. These are even on par with beats wireless headphones and far cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Zayd Siddiqui

customer_reviews.title: Good so far but bulkier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I really like them a lot...only problem is they are a little too bulky...I bought them to wear under my ear muffs while working offshore...I'm not able to so I guess I'll be giving these to my wife and ordering a different kind real soon...
customer_reviews.author: jeremy solar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound durable
customer_reviews.text: Sound is better than my100$ JBL I got at Bestbuy. This is also the second pair of bluetooth headphones I have got the previous set I had for 2 years , during those two years i abused the hell out of them sweating into them for 8-10hours a day at work then 3 days a week at the gym .
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a replacement for other similar headphones. This are great value for the money. Good Bass delivery and sound range.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Can't expect perfect at thirty bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Most annoying was the volume button response. I only want to turn it up/down a bit, not a LOT. Second is the sound quality. It's not clear enough, too muddy. I'll need to pay more for quality I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ward

customer_reviews.title: Testing buds
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and noticed that I louse music for a second don't know if its the ear buds or phone , I'll try my other buds in the morning to confirm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its worth, this kind of price and get premium quality.
customer_reviews.text: it's AWESOME..definitely worth it, I have BOSE QC35 and Beat PRO headphone, but it can't be used for gym ( sweat all over my head ). try to have SENSO headphone, the sound was amazing, clear and definitely can compare with branded headphone. really recommend this 1.
customer_reviews.author: shippo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They stay in place when I am working out. I don't have to deal with a wire connected to my iPhone., and the sound is great. The case is nice and easily fits into my handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Get em!
customer_reviews.text: after a few uses - I have already gotten my monies worth - really - those other high priced ear phones can suck it...:-) - very pleased! - even recommended to my GF and she loves her as well...
customer_reviews.author: Natel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great! Just like beats head phones! Great quality and pretty good noise canceling for ear phones. Also the volume is pretty loud 👍
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor distance
customer_reviews.text: The range you can go from the wireless Bluetooth is very poor, I had a cheap wireless headphone who distance is far superior. The sound quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: anthony bolden

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality for a Senso Headphone
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Senso headphones and these are the worst in quality. They have a "tunnel" sound quality compared to other Senso products.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Stays in ear while working out and Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. They stay in your ears even while running and working out and sweating. I’ve been looking for a pair like these and have tried numerous brands and these have been the best by far. Even better, the sound quality is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeCaro

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good except for sound quality.  is average at best
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected base on the product description. However, my expectation of the quality of the sound is too high and I can’t settle for this. The quality of the bass, treble, depth, and clarity are same as the free headset that comes with iPhone. I expected it to be a notch or 2 better!
customer_reviews.author: David Dean

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Holding A Charge
customer_reviews.text: The device was purchased June 2018 and stopped holding a charge June 2019. Prior to this month the device worked fine. I would have evaluated the product at 5 stars except for the lack of longevity. The window that Amazon provides to contact the manufacturer is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Burress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! User friendly, terrific price, comfortable, convenient, and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lilhulks

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life (4-5 hours), good bass, and fits my ears....love these over the previous generation earbuds. Just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line bluetooth sweatproof headphones! Compared to the powerbeats3..these are so much better and 1/3 of the price. I would recommend these to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: James Mace

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I think these headphones are a fabulous quality for the price. My only complaint, and why I did not give it a overall rating of 5 stars is that the piece that wraps around the ear does not fit snuggly to my ear, and you are not able to adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ozier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great sounding.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love the headphones. I haven't used them long enough to determine battery life or durability, but they sound great and are comfortable to wear during a gym workout.
customer_reviews.author: curious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing Senso earbuds. The first ones were for me and I about this pair for my hubby. He says they're excellent! Much better than another brand's he had previously
customer_reviews.author: SDinKC

customer_reviews.title: Annoying flashing light
customer_reviews.text: The flashing light every few seconds is really annoying for me.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My friend loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend, and I already had a pair. He loves them, and uses them every day in his landscaping business.
customer_reviews.author: Austin M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon rocks!!!😀
customer_reviews.text: Right on time and just as described. Great product !
customer_reviews.author: Curtis m kulp

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great Item and the time getting to me was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Never fails in any condition
customer_reviews.text: I wear these in the fitness center and continue when I go into the steam room or sauna and they never fail. An extremely durable product with great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: Needs higher volume
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time all in one piece these two are Christmas presents so haven't checked yet or tested bought a set months ago very happy good quality product except volume could go higher
customer_reviews.author: T J K SR

customer_reviews.title: Last Senso product I will order.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with sound quality, and function of earbuds. The buttons are not sensitive to touch and have to be touched more than once in order to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Range is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for 3 days best wireless earbuds I’ve ever had. I noticed today I was at least 50 yards from my phone before the music started cuttting out never lost it all
customer_reviews.author: Wynndie

customer_reviews.title: great sound, easy to use, convenient storage case and variety of accessories
customer_reviews.text: I WILL USE THIS PRODUCT SROUND THE HOUES, OR WHILE WALKING OR ON TRIPS. HAVE ONLY USED FOR A FEW DAYS BUT SO FAR AM IMPRESSED WITH THE SOUND QUALITY, GOOD USER INSTRUCTIONS, AND EASE OF USE.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Device Failed After 3 Months!
customer_reviews.text: Device failed to power on after about 3 months of ownership. Suspect heavy perspiration during workouts was more moisture than it could handle. Senso did respond quickly with shipment of replacement device. We'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable with sufficient external sound suppression and good sound. Good price/quality equation
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of sensos. Previews model s250, made a light background noise on left earbud, the new ones s270 do not. Very confortable with sufficient external sound suppression and good sound. Good price/quality equation.
customer_reviews.author: PABLO DEL VALLE

customer_reviews.title: I am a previous owner of the S-250 model, ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a previous owner of the S-250 model, and I have to say Senso has delivered a quality product, yet again! The S-270 model has a slight edge, the sound is just more "Crisp". Also to my surprise, these are smaller than they appear online. There's a bulky look to them from the pictures, but that is not the case very sleek looking. A Must Buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: They worked really well for the two weeks they worked. Customer service did make an effort to correct the situation but it was more trouble than it was worth. They are not good or reliable headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of bluetooth earbuds. Should have been my first.
customer_reviews.author: LAEliazar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I have very small ear openings and have a horrible time with any ear buds. These stay on my ears great with the hooks on them. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: She says they work great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She uses them for running and pairs them with her iphone. She says they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I can't exactly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: They worked well enough for a few weeks, then started producing a gut-wrenching screech when I try to play anything. I can't exactly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Would like more functionality with
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job. Would like more functionality with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Ted Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Love having Bluetooth headphones that are still connected, and the water resistance is a great plus. They work great. One pair was stolen so I immediately bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after five uses
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were fine for the price the five times I used them. However, after the fifth use, they no longer turn on and are now useless. Even after running through the troubleshooting recommendations in the users manual, they do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these work great, they are just a little bigger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: these work great, they are just a little bigger than I would like. I wanted to use them snowboarding but they are too big on my ears to pull my hat over or wear goggles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work fine. Bass is just right. Fits in ear fine. Can't ask for more with this price!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bologna

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Spotify and Audible Books
customer_reviews.text: Definitely meets my expectations! One suggestion: would have been nice if some kind of a sliding clippy thing could have been included to adjust the cable length between the two ear pieces.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have 2, one at home for running and one at work. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. The clarity is incredible much better than products that I've paid double on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery fails after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Returned first Senso ActivBuds after battery failed at 8 weeks. Amazon replaced unit. After 6 weeks, replaced unit only has 14 minutes of playing time after a 20 hour charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short life and bluetooth connectivity problems.
customer_reviews.text: Product died in under 6 months. The last month I had it wouldn't stay connected to Bluetooth. I had to constantly reconnect until today now it won't turn on. Going with another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackeem

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and great sound quality. I have been surprised by the battery life and the extras that came with (2 charging cable and car adapter).
customer_reviews.author: MTLind

customer_reviews.title: JUNK - AVOID AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews are saying, these went completely dead within a day. I mean dead dead - wouldn't charge, nothing after five hours of nornal use. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: christine morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. The battery life is great. I’ve purchased a couple of these to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: cinthia

customer_reviews.title: Senso headphone review
customer_reviews.text: Overall head phones are great. Had purchased them about 6 months after a friend had purchased them and had good luck. Battery life seems to be decent for wireless headphones as I can go about a week of workouts without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad LaVarnway

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and noise cancelation, battery life isn’t as good as my old senso s-250s but still last all day easily. Dropped them in my koi pond (on accident) and still play fine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kaelin

product_meta.title: Senso ActivBuds Bluetooth Wireless Headphones, Durable IPX7 Waterproof Sports Earphones w/Mic, HD Sound w/Accurate Bass, Secure Comfort Fit Earbuds for Running, Noise Cancelling Sweatproof Headsets
product_meta.description:
Brand: Senso
Model: ActivBuds S-270
Color: Black / Grey

WHY THE SENSO ACTIVBUDS S-270 IS THE BETTER CHOICE IN BLUETOOTH HEADPHONES?

- TRUE HIGH DEFINITION SOUND Enjoy Stereo Sound with High Definition and unparalleled rock-solid bass with ultra crisp treble.

- BLUETOOTH V4.1 SKIP-FREE WIRELESS UP TO 30 FEET

- IPX7 WATERPROOF / SWEATPROOF PROTECTION

- LONGER BATTERY LIFE – Better battery efficiency with up to 8 HOURS of play.

- STYLISH AND ERGONOMIC DESIGN Cordless Headphones

- PASSIVE NOISE CANCELLATION

- SECURE COMFORT FIT

- CONTROL CALLS - Hands Free Calling and Easy Controls for volume, skip, pause and play.

- COMPATIBLE WITH ALL BLUETOOTH ENABLED DEVICES Connect with two smart phones at once.

- PREMIUM PACKAGING AND PREMIUM QUALITY ACCESSORIES - 1 Year Warranty / 30 Day Hassle-Free Returns

Technical specification:
- Bluetooth Specification: 4.1+EDR
- IPX7 Waterproof Rating
- Noise Reduction: CVC6.0
- Transmission Distance: 30ft
- Battery: Lithium-ion Polymer 85mAh
- Frequency Response: 20 -22kHz
- Charging Port: Micro USB
- Charging Time: 1-2 Hours
- Playback Time: Up to 8 Hours
- Standby Time: 240h

What's in the Box:
Bluetooth Headhpone
Carrying Case
Short Charging Cable
3 Sets of Ear Tips - Small, Medium, Large
Cable Management Clip
User Manual

Bonus Items:
Dual Port USB Car Charger
3ft. Charging Cable for Apple (Lightening connector) and Android (Mini USB connector) Devices

Buyers Trust the SENSO Brand which is Dedicated to the Highest Quality Products and Fanatical Customer Support. Your COMPLETE SATISFACTION is our primary objective.

Enjoy Freedom of Sound for an Active Lifestyle - Quantities may be limited - ORDER NOW!
feature_bullets: TRUE HD HIGH FIDELITY SOUND Featuring latest Bluetooth 4.1 CSR technology and state of the art acoustic components that produce incredible sound quality with deep bass and crystal clear treble.

COMFORTABLE AND SECURE FIT WITH IPX-7 WATERPROOF RATING - ActivBuds feature Ergonomically designed flexible ear hooks with gel flex silicone earbuds to ensure your headphones stay comfortably firm in place to guarantee fatigue free ears and tangle free comfort.
LONGEST BATTERY LIFE - The new and improved lithium polymer battery allows seamless enjoyment of music for up to 8 hours and 240 hours stand-by with a quick charge of only 1.5 hours.

BLUETOOTH V4.1 WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY WITH CVC 6.0 NOISE SUPPRESSION TECHNOLOGY - Connect seamlessly with all Bluetooth enabled devices up to 30 feet away. With Noise Suppression technology focus on your favorite music and answer calls without skips or missed words.

1 YEAR WARRANTY AND BONUS ITEMS - Bonus Accessories with 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty and 30 days no-questions-asked return policy. Value for money guaranteed, Buy the Senso ActiveBuds worry free today.
